text:
A fast, easy choice among many in Plaza Singapore.
I think, weird enough, Plaza Singapore doesn't have this besides that many F&B outlets here. They are mostly expensive, not filling, weird, or not fast/easy.

I remember there used to be a foodcourt but couldn't find it now, so, we settled for Burger King. Burger King is not a economical fast food, but it's familiar to get if you want something fast and simple.

Since a while ago, I feel the burger's quality has gone down but yeah, it's still okay.
Su Xiang is courteous.  Food are delicious.  The fries are fat(not thin) , inside fluffy, outside crisp and remains warm, definitely better than McDonald's. Now kid's meal toy offer is smurf ^^
Su Siang very polite. I was here for early lunch. She ensure my whopper and Kaya pie is fresh and hot. She also came over again and ask how my meal. Thumb up.

Comfort food. The onion rings and mushroom Swiss are still awesome.
Prompt service from the crew too.
My colleagues had the vegetarian Whopper which are great too.

I just wanted to take a moment to appreciate the fantastic service I received at Plaza Singapura] on 11 March 25.The staff was incredibly friendly, efficient, and attentive, making my dining experience enjoyable.

In particular, Ashley and Su was very polite and made sure my order was accurate and served promptly. The restaurant was clean, and the atmosphere was welcoming. It’s always great to see a team that genuinely cares about customer satisfaction.

Keep up the great work! I’ll definitely be coming back.

Best regards,
Rachel.
